name: Hyper Bubble Drive
description:
In a world where cars are powered by bubbles and acceleration is an endless climb, try to keep your car under control against the odds. Other drivers will try to stop you, and the only defenses you have against them are speed and power-ups, if you are lucky enough to find the right one at the right time. Stay on the road and attempt to balance increasingly difficult laps as you continue to gain momentum--and lose control of your pesky steering wheel. Have fun and don't burst your bubble trying to make it past a handful of laps

CONTROLS:

Steer with the cursor

Left click to honk

CREDITS

Programming  by Ethan Lynch

Sound and Music by Greg Swope

Art and Visual Development by Kestrel Jurkiewicz-Miles
